comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Miss Condon's engagement was announced on May 17, 1914. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B03E6D9173AE633A...

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is a bit from a news story, that may help us: Ex-Lieut. Gov. Timothy L. Woodruff, ex-leader of the Kings County Republican organization, whose eleventh-hour flop to Col. Roosevelt during the Chicago convention has brought the wrath of the organization Republicans down upon him, made public a statement yesterday of his reasons for deserting Taft and his party. (NYTimes July 12, 1912)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo was taken at a reception for New York Bull Moose gubernatorial candidate Oscar Straus and Mrs. Straus, held at the Port Washington, Long Island, home of Bull Moose congressional candidate Bourke Cokran, on September 28, 1912 -- kicking off the Bull Moose (Progressive Party) campaign in Nassau County. Story in The New York Times, September 29, 1912: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F04EFD9113AE6... Other Bain/LOC photos of the Lawn Fete for Oscar Straus: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516557862/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739507/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739229/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516557368/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516555780/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556066/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733737/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733049/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556980/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515732783/in/photostream/]
